subject: refactor: implement Koinz style guide across entire app
body:
- Migrate color palette to Koinz standards:
  - Background: #121212 → #1B1B1B
  - Card/Elevated: #1E1E1E → #2a2a2a
  - Primary: #3D5AFE → #2D68FF
  - Border: #404040 → #333333

- Simplify accent colors: Remove Ruby/Emerald jewel tones,
  unify on single primary blue (#2D68FF)

- Add Figtree font via Google Fonts with proper fallbacks

- Unify all 37 tone tag colors to primary blue

- Add Koinz CSS variables and typography utility classes
  (text-heading-1 through text-caption)

- Update all ActivityIndicator and shadow colors across app

Files changed: theme.js, tailwind.config.js, global.css,
tones.ts, CLAUDE.md, and all app screens/components
title: implement Koinz style guide across entire app
